name: ttx-wasm
description: A dual-runtime FontTools TTX library for browser (WebAssembly) and Node.js (native Python) environments

scripts.build: npm run clean && npm run build:js
scripts.build:js: rollup -c && powershell -Command "if (Test-Path 'dist/types') { if (!(Test-Path 'types')) { mkdir types } ; Copy-Item -Recurse 'dist/types/src/js/*' 'types/' -Force ; Remove-Item -Recurse 'dist/types' }" && powershell -Command "Copy-Item dist/ttx-wasm.esm.js demo/" && powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse dist/pyodide demo/ -Force"
scripts.build:dual: npm run clean && rollup -c rollup-dual.config.js && npm run build:types && npm run build:demo
scripts.build:types: powershell -Command "if (Test-Path 'dist/types') { if (!(Test-Path 'types')) { mkdir types } ; Copy-Item -Recurse 'dist/types/src/js/*' 'types/' -Force ; Remove-Item -Recurse 'dist/types' }"
scripts.build:demo: powershell -Command "Copy-Item dist/ttx-wasm.esm.js demo/" && powershell -Command "Copy-Item -Recurse dist/pyodide demo/ -Force"
scripts.prepublishOnly: npm run test && npm run build
scripts.start:demo: npm run build:dev && npx http-server demo -p 8080 -c-1 -o
scripts.start:browser: npm run build:dev && npx http-server demo -p 8080 -c-1 -o

author: Matt LaGrandeur <matt@lagrandeur.com>
